channel.title: TIMES NOW | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/Timesnow

item.title: Shocking scenes were witnessed
item.description: Shocking scenes were witnessed in West Bengal as BJP called for a 12-hour strike. TMC and BJP workers clashed in several places. Also, some senior leaders from West Bengal BJP, including Locket Chaterjee, were detained by the police. Protests that started with demands for justice for RG Kar victim, completely changed into political rivalry on August 28. Watch the video to know more. #WestBengal #NabannaMarch #TNOriginals #TimesNowOriginals

item.title: US Ambassador To India Eric Ga
item.description: US Ambassador To India Eric Garcetti Says Power Of India-US Collaboration Is 'Unprecedented' #EricGarcetti #TNshorts

item.title: The fitness queen Malaika Aror
